about_the_game:
Players who enter the discord can get a free game code from the administrator during working hours after up to level 3.

Some suggestions for you adventurers
1.The game may have few players when it is just launched, we recommend you to find your teammates in the community in advance.

2.Early access does not mean the final quality, we will gradually improve

3.Please be civilized in multiplayer games and do not involve in sensitive topics such as politics.


WHAT IS NOTME?

Not me is an asymmetric VR game. The theme is an exciting survival adventure on a deserted island, as a werewolf or human.

Eight adventurers will explore the mysterious island, but the ship has been damaged by the storm. The werewolves on the island had already killed the two adventurers and blended into the team. You must discover who the wolves are while trying to gather supplies and repair the boat.

If you have more questions, please join our discord and contact the administrator
detailed_description:
JOIN US ON DISCORD


About the Game

Players who enter the discord can get a free game code from the administrator during working hours after up to level 3.

Some suggestions for you adventurers
1.The game may have few players when it is just launched, we recommend you to find your teammates in the community in advance.

2.Early access does not mean the final quality, we will gradually improve

3.Please be civilized in multiplayer games and do not involve in sensitive topics such as politics.


WHAT IS NOTME?

Not me is an asymmetric VR game. The theme is an exciting survival adventure on a deserted island, as a werewolf or human.

Eight adventurers will explore the mysterious island, but the ship has been damaged by the storm. The werewolves on the island had already killed the two adventurers and blended into the team. You must discover who the wolves are while trying to gather supplies and repair the boat.

If you have more questions, please join our discord and contact the administrator
name: NOT ME

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR only, need Quest1&2/Pico controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR only, need Quest1&2/Pico controller

short_description: The eight adventurers will explore the mysterious island, but the ship has been damaged by the storm and cannot return. Little did they know that the werewolves on the island had already killed the two adventurers and blended in with the team, playing hide-and-seek with the other humans.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
